data.title: Angry?
data.statement:
You got a text message on the phone from your mom. She is always angry, and, to express the pitch of her voice, she writes in uppercase every word that has an even length (punctuation doesn't count).
To make her happy, you must help her by programming a helper for the keyboard.

testCases.title: Symbols Check
testCases.testIn: I don't want you anymore! You are stressful.
testCases.testOut: I DON'T WANT you anymore! You are stressful.

testCases.title: Validator 3
testCases.testIn: I can't believe you! You are such a bad son...
testCases.testOut: I CAN'T believe you! You are SUCH a bad son...

testCases.title: Now it is really bad
testCases.testIn: Stop programming and do your homework!
testCases.testOut: STOP programming and DO YOUR HOMEWORK!

testCases.title: Validator 4
testCases.testIn: Do not hack anything again! Wanna you get in jail?
testCases.testOut: DO not HACK ANYTHING again! Wanna you get IN JAIL?

data.constraints:
0 < text length < 512
Punctuation is limited to {{. ' ! ?}}.
data.inputDescription: The text that she wants to send, 1 line
data.outputDescription: The text edited by the keyboard helper, 1 line.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You got a text message on the phone from your mom. She is always angry, and, to express the pitch of her voice, she writes in uppercase every word that has an even length (punctuation doesn't count).
To make her happy, you must help her by programming a helper for the keyboard.
Input
The text that she wants to send, 1 line
Output
The text edited by the keyboard helper, 1 line.
Constraints
0 < text length < 512
Punctuation is limited to . ' ! ?.
Example
Input
Are you stupid?
Output
Are you STUPID?
